By clicking ‚ÄúAdd to Chrome‚Äù, I accept and agree to installing the Fractal Art extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

üé® Introducing Fractal Art ‚Äì a Chrome Extension that brings a unique and captivating aesthetic to your new tab browsing experience.

 üé® With this extension, you will be greeted with a mesmerizing animation of fractal patterns every time you open a new tab. This dynamic background will add a touch of beauty and inspiration to your day, making your time spent browsing the web a more enjoyable experience.

üîñ But Fractal Art isn't just about looks. The extension also comes with a number of convenient features that will make your browsing experience more productive. One of these features is the bookmarks feature, which allows you to easily access your favorite websites with just a click. This feature eliminates the need to remember long URLs, saving you time and effort.

üïµÔ∏è In addition to the bookmarks feature, Fractal Art also includes a search tab feature. This feature allows you to search the web directly from your new tab, without having to navigate away from your current page. This feature is especially useful when you need to quickly find information or complete a task.

 üé® Fractal Art seamlessly combines both aesthetics and functionality, making it a must-have for anyone looking to elevate their browsing experience. It's easy to install and, if you ever want to remove it, easy to uninstall as well. Get it now and experience the beauty of fractals every time you open a new tab.
